body_html:
There are other things to do to scale in addition to using nccl. That's why there are tensorflow/benchmarks, distribution strategy (and tensorpack as well) to do the other necessary work to scale.

Going back to the original issue, I also hope to see some examples that use distribution strategy without Estimator or Keras.

body:
There are other things to do to scale in addition to using nccl. That's why there are tensorflow/benchmarks, distribution strategy (and tensorpack as well) to do the other necessary work to scale.

Going back to the original issue, I also hope to see some examples that use distribution strategy without Estimator or Keras.
